data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Fluminense needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Edina Alves Batista awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Attention is being given to Gremio’s Matheus Henrique and play has been suspended briefly.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Gremio's Matheus Henrique looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Edina Alves Batista signals a Fluminense throw-in in Gremio's half.
Throw-in for Gremio at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 6, Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 9, In Rio de Janeiro Gremio's Pepe is caught offside.
Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Gremio are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 12, Gremio surge into the attack at Estadio do Maracana but Diego Churin’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 13, Gremio will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fluminense.
Fluminense push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Nino gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gremio defence.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
Michel Araujo (Fluminense) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 16, Edina Alves Batista awards Gremio a goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro, Caio Paulista of Fluminense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Fluminense drive upfield and Michel Araujo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gremio defender.
In the minute 18, Important block from the Gremio defence as Caio Paulista fires in a strike for Fluminense.
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in Fluminense.
Throw-in for Gremio at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 22, Gremio have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense drive forward through Hudson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Gremio.
Goal! Pepe gives Gremio a 0-1 lead.
Diego Churin with an assist there.
In the minute 30, Edina Alves Batista awards the home team a throw-in.
Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Gremio's Darlan Mendes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
David Braz of Gremio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 34, Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Dodi of Fluminense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Gremio at Estadio do Maracana.
Gremio's Luis Orejuela misses with an attempt on goal.
Edina Alves Batista awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Hudson (Fluminense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fred (Fluminense) strikes at Estadio do Maracana but his header is cleared.
In the minute 43, Gremio are coming forward and Diogo Barbosa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Marcos Paulo is replacing Caio Paulista for the home team.
The home team replace Michel Araujo with Ganso.
In the minute 46, Gremio make their first substitution with Everton replacing Pepe.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Diego Churin for the away team is judged to be offside.
Gremio have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a third substitution, with Luiz Henrique replacing Wellington Silva.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Felippe Cardoso replacing Fred.
In the minute 68, Ferreira is on a sub for Diego Churin for Gremio.
Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Rio de Janeiro.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
In the minute 86, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio make their third substitution with Paulo Miranda replacing Darlan Mendes.
Edina Alves Batista awards the away team a throw-in.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Edina Alves Batista awards the home team a throw-in.
Gremio's Rodrigues gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Fluminense drives forward and Dodi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
At Estadio do Maracana, Diogo Barbosa has been yellow-carded for the away team.
